original_text: God did all this so that people would want to know him. They would look carefully for him and perhaps they would find him. Really, God is near to each of us.
korean_text: 이는 사람으로 혹 하나님을 더듬어 찾아 발견하게 하려 하심이로되 그는 우리 각 사람에게서 멀리 계시지 아니하도다

sentences.original_text: so that people would want to know him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사람들이 그분을 알고자 하게 하려고요

sentences.original_text: They would look carefully for him
and perhaps they would find him
Really, God is near to each of us
sentences.korean_translation: 정말로, 하나님은 우리 각자에게 가까이 계십니다
